text: Mars Incorporated is an American food company. They are mostly known as a chocolate manufacturer but they make many other foods. They also make food for pets. Brands include Uncle Ben's rice, Wrigley's, 3 Musketeers and M&M;'s. They employ 70,000 people worldwide. ==Other websites== *Official site *Uncle Ben's Category:Companies based in Virginia Category:1911 establishments in the United States
title: Mars, Incorporated
